content.question: Two commonly accepted interpretations of the paintings in the Great Hall of the Bulls at Lascaux are that they depict images related to hunting and that they depict

choices.label: the connection between the mortal and the spiritual realms
the symbolic representation of a battle against enemy forces
maps of conquered territories with their distinctive features
records of ancestral lineage written through the use of pictographs

content.answer: the connection between the mortal and the spiritual realms

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
